entry.def: Something that is Persian belongs or relates to the ancient kingdom of Persia, or sometimes to the modern state of Iran.
Persians were the people who came from the ancient kingdom of Persia.
Persian carpets and rugs traditionally come from Iran. They are made by hand from silk or wool and usually have patterns in deep colours.
Persian is the language that is spoken in Iran, and was spoken in the ancient Persian empire.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Iran;

sentences.sentence: "the majority of Irani are Persian Shiite Muslims"

means.word_mean: 2. the language of Persia (Iran) in any of its ancient forms
1. of or relating to Iran or its people or language or culture;

Sentence.sentence: However,while talking is largely subconscious and rapid, writing is deliberate and slow, Over time,writers took advantage of this and started crafting long-winded sentences such as this one:The whole engagement lasted above 12 hours, till the gradual retreat of the Persians was changed into a disorderly flight, of which the shameful example was given by the principal leaders and……" No one talks like that casually — or should
